name: Sparkling Apple-Cranberry Punch

ingredients.name: bottle
ingredients.original_string: 1  bottle (64 oz) cranberry and pomegranate juice (8 cups), chilled

ingredients.name: bottles
ingredients.original_string: 2  bottles (25.4 oz each) sparkling apple cider (6 1/2 cups), chilled

ingredients.name: bottles lime sparkling water
ingredients.original_string: 2  bottles (11.5 oz each) lime sparkling water, chilled

ingredients.name: to 3 unpeeled small apples
ingredients.original_string: 2  to 3 unpeeled small apples, thinly sliced

instructions: In large punch bowl, mix juice, cider and sparkling water. Stir in apple slices and frozen cranberries. Serve over ice.
